Tanks

类 Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the map, storing information about the current scene

      • addTanks

        public void addTanks(java.lang.String name,
                     Tank tank)
        Add a tank to the tank HashMap.
        参数:
        name - Player name
        tank - Tank object

      • addTrees

        public void addTrees(int index,
                     Tree t)
        Add a tree to the tree HashMap.
        参数:
        index - Tree's x coordinate
        t - Tree object

      • changeWind

        public int changeWind()
        Function to change wind speed. 卤5 based on the original
        返回:
        Current wind speed
